"""Client & vendors accounts.
 """
 
 from Products.ERP5Form.Report import ReportSection
 
 request = context.REQUEST
 at_date = request['at_date']
 section_category = request['section_category']
 simulation_state = request['simulation_state']
 role_filter_list = request.get('entity_role', None)
 omit_balanced_accounts = request['omit_balanced_accounts']
 from_date = request.get('from_date', None)
 gap_root = request.get('gap_root', None)
 
 request.other['is_accounting_report'] = True
 
 # role_filter_list == None means no filter on the role
 if role_filter_list == [''] :
 role_filter_list = None
 if role_filter_list:
 role_filter_list = ['role/%s' % r for r in role_filter_list]
 
 result = []
 
 params = {
 'at_date' : at_date
 , 'section_category': section_category
 , 'simulation_state': simulation_state
 , 'report_depth' : 5
 #, 'where_expression' : " section.portal_type = 'Organisation' "
 }
 
 params['hide_grouping'] = request['omit_grouped_references']
 if from_date:
 params['from_date'] = from_date
 else :
 params['no_from_date'] = 1
 
 portal = context.portal_url.getPortalObject()
 simulation_tool = portal.portal_simulation
 
 entity_columns = [
 ('date', 'Date'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTranslatedPortalType', 'Type'),
 ('Movement_getNodeGapId', 'GAP'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationReference', 'Invoice No'),
 ('Movement_getExplanationTitle', 'Title'),
 ('Movement_getSpecificReference', 'Reference'),
 ('getTranslatedSimulationStateTitle', 'State'),
 ('debit', 'Debit'),
 ('credit', 'Credit'),
 ('running_total_price', 'Balance'),
 ]
 
 # build a list of all accounts which _strictly_ belongs to categories 
 # receivable or payable, to prepare parameter to the getInventory which
 # will tell wether this third party account is balanced or not.
 valid_node_uids = []
 if omit_balanced_accounts :
 for account in portal.portal_categories.resolveCategory(
 'account_type/asset/receivable'
 ).getAccountTypeRelatedValueList(
 strict_membership=1,
 portal_type='Account'):
 if not gap_root or account.isMemberOf(gap_root):
 valid_node_uids.append(account.getUid())
 for account in portal.portal_categories.resolveCategory(
 'account_type/liability/payable'
 ).getAccountTypeRelatedValueList(
 strict_membership=1,
 portal_type='Account'):
 if not gap_root or account.isMemberOf(gap_root):
 valid_node_uids.append(account.getUid())
 
 if not params['hide_grouping'] :
 entity_columns.append(('grouping_reference',
 'Grouping Reference'))
 
 for party in context.Account_zDistinctSectionList():
 o = party.getObject()
 keep_this_one = 1
 if role_filter_list:
 keep_this_one = 0
 for role in role_filter_list:
 if o.isMemberOf(role):
 keep_this_one = 1
 
 if not keep_this_one:
 continue
 
 if o.getPortalType() == 'Person' or\
 not o.isMemberOf(section_category):
 # don't show entities belonging to the group we are reporting
 if omit_balanced_accounts and (
 simulation_tool.getInventoryAssetPrice(
 mirror_section_uid=o.uid,
 node_uid=valid_node_uids, **params) == 0):
 pass
 else:
 title = o.getTitle()
 if o.getProperty('role', None):
 title += ' (%s)' % o.getRoleTranslatedTitle()
 result.append(
 ReportSection(title=title,
 level=1,
 path=o.getPhysicalPath(),
 form_id='Entity_viewAccountingTransactionList',
 selection_name = 'other_parties_report_selection',
 selection_params = params,
 selection_columns = entity_columns,
 selection_sort_order=[('stock.date', 'ascending'),
 ('stock.uid', 'ascending'),],))
 
 return result
